In this scenario, I might choose to use a mixed strategy with a slightly higher probability of picking R (p > 0.5) because the payoff is slightly better when we both pick R compared to B. In summary, I would choose a mixed strategy with a slight bias towards R (p > 0.5) as my preferred choice, recognizing that the specific numbers might adjust throughout the game as we both try to maximize our earnings.
